page.title: 12GAMES WE PLAY:-2.
page.content: HOT RICE. To play Hot Rice you need a ball and six or more children.Everyone stands in a circle and anyone may bounce the ball into the middle saying "H.O.T.R.I.C.E. spells Hot Rice". When hot rice is shouted,the person with the ball bounces it every time a letter or word is spoken.They then bounce it once more into the middle and then the ball has to roll under someone's legs.The person whose legs it rolls under is 'on'.The other players have to run and the one who is on runs and shouts,"Stop!Hot Rice!" Then the ball is thrown.If it hits a player they are out.This continues until everyone is out.Then the game starts again.
